messages.message: Invalid transferFunction for basic DFD. For an sRGB vkFormat it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
messages.details: Basic DFD #1 transferFunction is KHR_DF_TRANSFER_LINEAR but for vkFormat VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SRGB it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
DFD does not match VK_FORMAT w.r.t. sign, float or normalization.
